#summary Checkin of guest with an existing booking

== Synopsis ==

Standard checkin for 3 persons for 3 nights, payment taken on arrival.
Guest enters citing name/reservation number.


== Process ==

  # Click Bookings.
  # Enter name/reservation number, under "Match Dates By" select "Check-In Date" and set date to today. Click Search.
  # Find reservation. Click on edit icon.
  # Take remainder of guest(s) names. Click edit on each of the allocation fields and OK after entering the name of each guest. 
  # Balance to pay on arrival displayed. (Take payment from guest(s) and write up access cards).
  # Toggle status on the reservation by clicking on the dates of each allocation from (R)eserved to (P)aid. 
  # Click save.
